A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Finally got around to putting in my review despite seeing this day one in theaters\, as I have with all Star Wars movies. This flick was one hot piece of garbage\, riddled with plot holes\, questionable decisions\, and the halting of any momentum the new trilogy was building up. Rian Johnson\, Kathleen Kennedy\, and Disney should be ashamed for letting this mess reach the big screen.
